snippet: Prime Minister Antonis Samaras of Greece spoke, and a lively discussion of the European economic crisis followed as the International Herald Tribune convened The Global Conversation to celebrate its 125th anniversary.
abstract: Prime Minister Antonis Samaras of Greece spoke, and a lively discussion of the European economic crisis followed as the International Herald Tribune convened The Global Conversation to celebrate its 125th anniversary.

headline.main: Live From Paris, the Global Conversation
